desc: All natural, aromatherapy based, home, baby and body products formulated by a certified Aromatherapist in Barrie, Ontario Toxic free, phosphate free, diaper cream, sls free, natural cleaning, natural body, natural baby, diaper rash, baby rash, chemical free products,

layout.text:
Lotus Natural Living products are all natural products, formulated and created by Certified Aromatherapist Denise Sutherland in Ontario, Canada.

Our products are made with locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. They are scented with pure essential oils.
